dcterms:creator: M. Granroth
S. Clark
dcterms:description: The MCNC task requires the prediction model to choose the most reasonable subsequent event from five candidate events given an event context. Each event is abstracted to Predicate-GR form, which represents an event in a structure of {subject, predicate, object, prepositional object}.
dcterms:title: Multiple Choice Narrative Cloze Task (MCNC)

dcterms:creator: N. Mostafazadeh
N. Chambers
X. He
D. Parikh
D. Batra
L. Vanderwende
P. Kohli
J. Allen
dcterms:description: The SCT task requires models to select the correct ending from two candidates given a story context. Compared with MCNC which focuses on abstract events, the stories in SCT are concrete events and with much more details.
dcterms:title: Story Cloze Test (SCT)
